projects.title: Build a Blogging Website
projects.description: Developed and Implemented RESTful API using Express JS. Designed an interactive and responsive user interface utilizing Tailwind CSS and React JS. Utilized MongoDB to store user data, facilitating blog content creation, reading, and editing.

projects.title: Spotify App using Spotify API
projects.description: Created a Web App to fetch user Weekly Discovery Playlists from the Spotify API. Utilized Context-API to eliminate prop-drilling.

projects.title: Store API
projects.description: Developed a Home Decor Store API using Node.js, Express, and MongoDB, with Postman aiding API development and testing. Key components include controllers, db, middleware, models, and routes.

projects.title: Open Weather App
projects.description: Developed a weather forecasting website with real-time data from Open Weather Map API, featuring error handling for user-friendliness.

experiences.description: I acquired valuable experience in collaborating with a team to develop a commercial website. Event Desu is a Startup in Tokyo, Japan which is a aggregator service for the entertainment industry whereby it assist people with information and ticketing for various events across many cities all over Japan.

Participating in Hacktoberfest as a contributor and maintainer was a rewarding journey. I enjoyed collaborating with the open-source community, submitting valuable pull requests, and helping others improve their coding skills. It was a fantastic learning experience.

My main focus these days is building products and leading projects for our clients at Upstatement. In my free time I've also released an online video course that covers everything you need to know to build a web app with the Spotify API.

paragraphs.content: In 2012, my family and I had an unforgettable trip to the Taj Mahal. We got a new camera to capture the special moments, but unfortunately, I accidentally deleted all the photos, leading to a scolding and a profound sense of guilt. This incident sparked my passion for computer science, pushing me to explore digital data recovery to retrieve those lost memories. Since then, I've been captivated by the limitless possibilities and innovations that the world of computer science has to offer.

My main focus these days is strengthening my computer science skills, specializing in web technology. I'm always up for thrilling coding adventures, aiming to gain expertise and expand my knowledge. In my free time I enjoy writing blogs on computer science and emerging web technologies.
When I'm not at the computer, I'm usually playing football, hanging out with my friends and family, or running around Dehradun & Mussoorie searching for a new places to explore.
